short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TruthGuard is the ultimate defense against fake news. Users receive a credibility score to assess the trustworthiness of a source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In today's age, fake news has become a significant challenge, threatening the accessibility of reliable information. TruthGuard is the ultimate defense against fake news and misinformation. This app is designed to help users make informed decisions and protect the integrity of trustworthy journalism. Users receive a credibility score that helps them assess the trustworthiness of a source.
